mapper.select: select d.doctorseq, d.hospitalid, d.doctorname, d.doctorimage, dept.departmentname, d.departmentSeq, d.workStatus from tbldoctor d inner join tbldepartment dept on d.departmentseq = dept.departmentseq where d.hospitalid = #{hospitalId} and d.workstatus in ('y', 'Y') and dept.departmentname = #{departmentname}
select * from tblchild where userseq = #{userseq} and ischildunregister in('n','N')
